author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r39154, revert accidental commit of deprecated.c

author: rhuijben
msg: [The deprecated.c part of this patch was reverted in r39155]
Remove the usage of access batons from the status editor. This
switches some entry functions to the new wc_db functions.
(handle_dir_entry): Assume the passed entry is the full entry.
(get_dir_status): Load childnodes directly from wc-db. Use an extra
hash to collapse all status call updates in a single loop.

author: hwright
msg: [[ Reverted in r39153, see discussion on list.
*  The possible solution for keeping backwards compatibility
*  'making access baton close a no-op' doesn't work because
*  in that case we can never close wc.db files before deleting
*  a working copy with an independent access baton in the same
When opening access batons, recursively lock all its subdirectories to an
infinite depth as well.  In wc-ng, we don't have the notion of recursively
opening a database; it's either open or it's not.  By making this change now,
we can remove the existing complexity of determining how many levels to lock
We also gain another advantage.  When attempting to open a baton, we can check
and see if that baton is already opened, and just return it if it is.  By
always recursively locking, we can guarantee that a found baton is also
recursively locked, which is what the original caller may have intended.
All this simplifies our current access baton usage, and the path to removal.
Oh, and it incidentally fixes copy test 76.
(open_single): Check and see if a baton exists before opening a new one.
(do_open): Always recursively lock to an infinite depth.  Also, don't
duplicate the missing placeholder in the shared set.

author: rhuijben
msg: Remove all access baton and entry handing in svn (the commandline client)
The new node api makes it possible to check if files are part of a
working copy without opening an access baton.
(main): Move initialization of the client context up and use this context
for retrieving the node kind of arguments passed with -F.
(svn_cl__propedit): Pass ctx and use the wc-node api instead of an
